src.cogs.birthdays module¶

class src.cogs.birthdays.Birthdays(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: Cog

daily_bday¶

A background task helper that abstracts the loop and reconnection logic for you.

The main interface to create this is through loop().

src.cogs.birthdays.setup(bot: Bot) → None¶

src.cogs.counting module¶

class src.cogs.counting.Counting(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: Cog

async static clear_fail_role() → None¶

Clears fail roles from all users on all servers

async count(msg)¶

Triggered on all messages, used to check for counting game

Parameters:

msg (discord.Message) – Message that triggered function

async static fail(msg: Message, err_txt: str, roleID: int) → None¶

Handles a generic counting failure

Parameters:

  • msg (discord.Message) – Message that failed

  • err_txt (string) – Failure message to print to channel

  • roleID (int) – ID of role to assign to user that failed
